Xinyu Lian

I am a second-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, working with Minjia Zhang. I study elastic and efficient machine learning systems, effective efficiency algorithms, with a current emphasis on RL training and efficient training kernels.

üôã Feel free to reach out via email if you are interested in my research.

Apr 29, 2025 Our work Universal Checkpointing has been accepted at USENIX ATC 2025.
Feb 3, 2025 I am honored to receive the Amazon PhD Fellowship ($70K).
